references: B. N. Cyvin et al., Isomer enumeration of unbranched catacondensed polygonal systems with pentagons and heptagons, Match, No. 34 (Oct 1996), pp. 109-121.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: E.g.f. for column k: 2^k*x^k/k!*exp(2*x). - _Geoffrey Critzer_, Feb 13 2014
mathematica: nn=8;Map[Select[#,#>0&]&,Transpose[Table[Range[0,nn]!CoefficientList[Series[2^k x^k/k! Exp[2x],{x,0,nn}],x],{k,0,nn}]]]//Grid (* _Geoffrey Critzer_, Feb 13 2014 *)Flatten[Table[Binomial[i,j]2^i,{i,0,10},{j,0,i}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 28 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
